data.title: What's new on Paramount+ in August 2024
data.meta_description: One Life, SEAL Team's final season, the premiere of Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and more are all coming to Paramount+ in August 2024.
data.text:
Paramount+ is bringing the heat in August with a terrific lineup of shows and movies. Unfortunately, some films like the emotionally moving biopic One Life, are only going to be available on the highest tiers of Paramount+ with Showtime. But that particular movie is a can’t-miss film that features Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn as Sir Nicholas Winton, a man whose actions saved innocent children during the Holocaust.

The final season of SEAL Team is also premiering this month on Paramount+, but younger fans may gravitate towars the new animated show Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Among the new arrivals in film, Election and An Inconvenient Truth seem very timely. But there are also plenty of fan-favorite titles including Airplane!, Coming to America, Almost Famous, Fatal Attraction, Face/Off, and Pulp Fiction.

Recommended Videos

Certain titles are only available to Paramount+ with Showtime subscribers. Keep that in mind when looking over our roundup of everything new on Paramount+ in August 2024. The shows and movies below marked with an asterisk (*) are only available on Paramount+ with Showtime. Titles marked with a double asterisk (**) can be live-streamed from CBS by Paramount+ with Showtime subscribers. Our picks for the month are in bold.

And if you subscribe to other streaming services, we also have helpful guides to the best movies on Netflix and best shows on Netflix, as well as the best movies streaming on Amazon and best TV shows streaming on Amazon, plus plenty of guides for Hulu, Disney+, and HBO Max.
